mortar

Interface Popup<D extends android.os.Parcelable,R>

  • Type Parameters:
    D - info to display

    public interface Popup<D extends android.os.Parcelable,R>
    Implemented by classes that run a popup display for a view, typically a dialog.
    See Also:
    PopupPresenter

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dismiss(boolean withFlourish) 
      android.content.Context getContext() 
      boolean isShowing() 
      void show(D info, boolean withFlourish, PopupPresenter<D,R> presenter)
      Show the given info.

    • Method Detail

      • show

        void show(D info,
        boolean withFlourish,
        PopupPresenter<D,R> presenter)
        Show the given info. How to handle redundant calls is a decision to be made per implementation. Some classes may throw IllegalStateException if the popup is already visible. Others may update a visible display to reflect the new info.

      • isShowing

        boolean isShowing()

      • dismiss

        void dismiss(boolean withFlourish)

      • getContext

        android.content.Context getContext()
